original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business operations and technical implementation, requiring a unique blend of analytical acumen, process expertise, and technical proficiency. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for translating complex business requirements into effective system configurations that optimize efficiency and drive meaningful impact. Your ability to understand nuanced business needs, document them clearly, and then translate them into tailored technical solutions will be instrumental in ensuring our systems accurately reflect and support core business functions.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across the organization to gather detailed requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and ensure comprehensive understanding of business needs
- Leverage your technical expertise to configure and maintain our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and updating configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing tools like database queries, reporting, and data visualization
- Proactively recommend process enhancements and system optimizations to streamline operations and boost efficiency
- Thoroughly test configurations to validate functionality and ensure they meet defined requirements, collaborating with stakeholders on user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Liaise with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless implementation and effective long-term support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively bridge the gap between business and technical stakeholders
- Adept at translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficient in the use of tools and techniques for gathering, documenting, and validating business requirements

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Expertise in SQL and database management

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successfully configuring and maintaining complex enterprise systems to support evolving business needs
- Demonstrable experience in leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to develop innovative solutions

Preferred Experience:
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
- Prior experience working within the vehicle configuration domain

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend configuration and management
- Database querying and reporting tools
- Data visualization and analytical software
- Requirement gathering and documentation tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with frequent stakeholder engagement
- Ability to work independently and proactively to drive projects forward
- Willingness to adapt to changing priorities and deadlines in a dynamic, fast-paced setting
- Commitment to continuous learning and professional development to stay ahead of industry trends
